values:
Ok today i had to drive my great grandpa and grandma to Beaumont Hospital for his check up.  So his appointment is at 1:00 and we get there around 12:30.  We had to wait and hour and a half before he even went into the room.  Then we had to wait and hour before he came out again.  Man I was Bored!!!!  Then there was this teenage girl who went out of the room and came back.  So when she came back i had my legs stretched out bcz i was cramping up.  So i moved them in to let her through and of course she says "thank you."  Then I look at my great grandmother and she taps me going " ha ha."  She thought i was flirting with her by moving my legs for her to get through,  I thought that was pretty weird.  Last night me and my friend Chris went out to see Evolution.  That was really funny.  That guy in the sprite commercial is really funny.  

   Man i am really sore.  I had to go play lacrosse this evening and lift.  During the game i should of had at least 7 goals But i just couldnt put the ball in the net. AGHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! that really makes me mad!!!   If any of ya wanna see me play Lacrosse ( ya right in my dreams i guess)  i play every monday and wednesday at 7:00-8:30 P.M.  I cant promise I will be playing well bcz i have m,y good days my bad days and the days were i have the chances but cant convert.  Well adios, asta la vista,and any beautiful ladies that can translate this leave a comment and or call me -- Las muchachas muy bonitas me llaman por favor.  :)

sincerely,

Music expresses feeling whether it be sadness, anger, or pleasure.  Just as it expresses feeling it effets people in the same way.  It can make some cry, feel happy, or pump people up for athletic events.  A definition of music in the dictionary is "... as to form structually complete and emotionally expressive compositions."
  Also music means something special to all of us.  A good example would be how a husband and wife always have "their" song.  Music also expresses what kind of person we are.  In conclusion, music is in all of us.  So what does yours say about you?
http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/2778.html

Too often, we lose sight of life's simple pleasures.  Remember, when someone hurts your feelings or annoys you it takes 42 muscles in your face to frown.  BUT, it only takes 4 muscles to extend your arm and bitch-slap the bastard upside the head.

http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/1848.html

Ok my weekend started off very slowly.  First, i had to take the ACT's.  That took soooooo long.  First of all i was tired and second some parts were impossible.  The one part that really took forever was the reading.  In that part there were four stories and the first two were soo confusing and made absolutely no sense.  Also to add on to that there was a lawnmower outside and we had the door open.  So i could not concentrate.  Then they added a fifth test which pissed me off bcz there was only supposed to be four.  Luckily it wasnt graded bcz i got an impossible math section that i had no clue what to do so i just started to fill in ovals.  Then my weekend got much better.  After the test i went home for a while and just for you Amber I watched Golden Girls.  Then i drove an hour to my cottage and man was i tired.  Anyway once i got there i had sooooo much fun.  First i started  to do some casting off my dock ( where i thought there was no fish but i was wrong) and i caught a northern pike.  Needless to say i was very happy.  Then we went down to my uncle's cottage and hung out there and the weirdest thing happened.  It started to snow.  well not really the seeds or something on the willow tree were blown off by the wind and it looked like it was snowing steadily for at least 15 minutes.  That was cool.  Then today started off well.  Me and my cousin decided to go fishing and i immediately caught two perch and then nothing and we let the perch go.  Then i had to go cut my grandma's cottage grass.  Then i decided to go on my cousins jet ski.  that wasnt smart. it wasnt that the water was cold even though it was ( i wore a wet suit that didnt really fit me but it worked)  it was that it was a stand up jet ski and i couldnt stand up.  i kinda fell a lot.  Then after that it rained and that ruined the day but now i am here and good and thats great in my book.  catch ya on the flip side!


( oh ya amber is this long enough to get on your friends list?)
http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/1553.html

ok I'm almost free i have one more exam left and I'm sooooo happy.  I also bet that amber is very happy bcz I'm actually writing in this.  I had a pretty good weekend.  I spent most of it studying for exams and act.   I would have to say the highlight of my weekend was spending saturday night with amber.  Ok for all you movie watchers out there you all have to see "Too Wong Foo Thanks for Everything Julie Newman"  two words for you " great movie."  I just cant wait to get school over with so i can have some R and R.  well thats basically most of the recent events in my life ( I know I know its really short but my life is really exciting right now so i will try to write more next time for you amber OK).
http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/1284.html

All this weekend and this week all i have been doing is studying.  I am sooooo sick of studying.  I am so happy that i have two more days of exams then i am done wooooooohooooooooo.  Well i made time to write in this bcz amber and jill really wanted me too.  So i figured if amber wanted me to i better do it.  so here i am.  And amber ill tell you what ill go into clares or icing or whatever ONLY if you go in with me.  and by the way  you all should see "Too Wong Foo Thanks for Everything Julie Newman"  its a great movie.  well g2g and study some more ill catch ya all later>  Peace!
http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/1246.html

This week really sucked.  First my game at Novi an Tuesday gets rained out so we drive all the way there for absolutely nothing.  Then we go back on Thursday and i was promised that i would play.  Well guess what, I didn't that really pisses me off.  Now I'm felling a little sick, hopefully thats just the weather.  All in all i would have to say that this week was horrific.  Hopefully my weekend will be better.  Wait scratch that my weekend will definitely be better, because I'm gonna make it better.  So a word of advice Never listen to your coach and if you actually get in the game shoot shoot shoot so you can score and make sure you hit someone as hard as you can!
http://kneepads1499.livejournal.com/1002.html
I finally get to play tomorrow at Novi.  I am gonna score! And hopefully Amber will let me see one of her soccer games.  well i cant think of anything else so Peace Out!
